Package it.uniba.main

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.uniba.main.Game
  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used for controlling and managing the progress of a chess game

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void draw()
      Write down on the chess form a draw as a result of the match
      Piece.SIDE getTurn()
      Returns the current turn side
      boolean kingInCheck​(Piece.SIDE side)
      Returns if the king of the side is in check
      void legalMoves()
      Prints a list of all possible moves for the current player
      void legalSquareMoves​(java.lang.String notation)
      Prints a list of all possible moves for the piece placed in the square, highlights the piece in yellow, shows possible moves in green and captures in red
      void material()  
      void materialForPlayer​(Player player, boolean white)
      Prints the material score of the player
      boolean move​(java.lang.String notation)
      It compares the notation taken as input with all the moves of the player and if it matches it executes it, otherwise it prints an error on the screen.
      void printCaptures()
      Prints the captures for each player

      Prints the chess form

      Prints the board

    • Method Detail

      • move

        public boolean move​(java.lang.String notation)
        It compares the notation taken as input with all the moves of the player and if it matches it executes it, otherwise it prints an error on the screen. If the move ends the game true, false otherwise
        Parameters:
        notation - input notation
        Returns:
        if the move ends the game true, false otherwise

      • legalSquareMoves

        public void legalSquareMoves​(java.lang.String notation)
        Prints a list of all possible moves for the piece placed in the square, highlights the piece in yellow, shows possible moves in green and captures in red
        Parameters:
        notation - the square position

      • materialForPlayer

        public void materialForPlayer​(Player player,
                              boolean white)
        Prints the material score of the player
        Parameters:
        player - selected player
        white - it's white or not
